languages.text: "Я с детства шла указанной мне стезей. Делала, что велено. Искала истину в чужих словах, а затем повторяла ее своим голосом. Я никогда не подвергала сомнению свою судьбу... Пока не появился ты, Немо". {n}Кибелла почти ласково скребет металлическими когтями по черепу в руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ха... Понятно. Я с детства привыкла ступать по указанной мне стезе. Делать, что велено. Искать истину в чужих словах, а затем повторять ее своим голосом. Я никогда не подвергала сомнению уготованную мне судьбу... Пока не появился ты, Немо". {n}Кибелла почти ласково скребет металлическими когтями по черепу в руках.{/n}

languages.text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я с детства шла указанной мне стезей. Делала, что велено. Искала истину в чужих словах, а затем повторяла ее своим голосом. Я никогда не подвергала сомнению свою судьбу... Пока не появился ты, Немо". {n}Кибелла почти ласково скребет металлическими когтями по черепу в руках.{/n}

I had never questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}Kibellah drags her metal claws along the skull in her hands almost affectionately.{/n}

And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

languages.text: «Toda mi vida he recorrido el camino que otros me han trazado. Hacía lo que me ordenaban. Buscaba la verdad en palabras ajenas y las repetía con mi propia voz. Y ni una sola vez he cuestionado mi destino... hasta que apareciste tú, Nemo». {n}El modo en que Kibellah desliza sus garras de metal por la calavera que sostiene en sus manos parece casi afectuoso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Toda mi vida he recorrido el camino que otros me han trazado. Hacía lo que me ordenaban. Buscaba la verdad en palabras ajenas y las repetía con mi propia voz. Y ni una sola vez he cuestionado mi destino... hasta que apareciste tú, Nemo». {n}El modo en que Kibellah desliza sus garras de metal por la calavera que sostiene en sus manos parece casi afectuoso.{/n}

languages.text: 「生まれてこの方、私はずっと定められた道を歩いてきたわ。言われたことをしていたの。他者の言葉の中に真実を探して、それを自分の声で繰り返した。そして、一度として運命を疑問に思ったことはなかったの…ネモ、あなたがやってくるまではね」{n}キベラが手にしている頭蓋骨を金属製の爪でゆっくりとひっかくその様子は、いっそ愛情に満ちているようにすら見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「生まれてこの方、私はずっと定められた道を歩いてきたわ。言われたことをしていたの。他者の言葉の中に真実を探して、それを自分の声で繰り返した。そして、一度として運命を疑問に思ったことはなかったの…ネモ、あなたがやってくるまではね」{n}キベラが手にしている頭蓋骨を金属製の爪でゆっくりとひっかくその様子は、いっそ愛情に満ちているようにすら見えた。{/n}

languages.text: “这么多年来，我一直都沿着他人为我制定好的道路前进，也一直在按照他人的吩咐去做。我从他们的话语中寻找真理，之后用自己的声音重复这些话语。我从来没质疑过自己的命运……直到你出现在我面前，涅墨。”{n}绮贝菈的金属利爪轻轻把玩着手中的头骨，看起来几乎算得上是饱含深情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这么多年来，我一直都沿着他人为我制定好的道路前进，也一直在按照他人的吩咐去做。我从他们的话语中寻找真理，之后用自己的声音重复这些话语。我从来没质疑过自己的命运……直到你出现在我面前，涅墨。”{n}绮贝菈的金属利爪轻轻把玩着手中的头骨，看起来几乎算得上是饱含深情。{/n}

languages.text: "Mein ganzes Leben habe ich die Straße beschritten, die mir bestimmt war. Ich habe getan, was mir gesagt wurde. Ich habe die Wahrheit in den Worten anderer gesucht und sie dann mit meiner eigenen Stimme wiederholt. Und ich habe meine Bestimmung nicht einmal angezweifelt ... bis Ihr des Weges kamt, Nemo." {n}Wie Kibellah mit ihren Metallklauen über den Schädel in ihren Händen streicht, wirkt beinahe liebevoll.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein ganzes Leben habe ich die Straße beschritten, die mir bestimmt war. Ich habe getan, was mir gesagt wurde. Ich habe die Wahrheit in den Worten anderer gesucht und sie dann mit meiner eigenen Stimme wiederholt. Und ich habe meine Bestimmung nicht einmal angezweifelt ... bis Ihr des Weges kamt, Nemo." {n}Wie Kibellah mit ihren Metallklauen über den Schädel in ihren Händen streicht, wirkt beinahe liebevoll.{/n}

languages.text: « Toute ma vie, j'ai suivi la route qui m'avait été imposée. J'ai fait ce qu'on me disait. J'ai cherché la vérité dans les propos des autres et je les ai repris à mon compte. Pas une seule fois je n'ai remis ma destinée en question... jusqu'au jour où nos routes se sont croisées, Némo. » {n}De ses griffes métalliques, Kibellah effleure presque avec tendresse le crâne qu'elle tient entre ses mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Toute ma vie, j'ai suivi la route qui m'avait été imposée. J'ai fait ce qu'on me disait. J'ai cherché la vérité dans les propos des autres et je les ai repris à mon compte. Pas une seule fois je n'ai remis ma destinée en question... jusqu'au jour où nos routes se sont croisées, Némo. » {n}De ses griffes métalliques, Kibellah effleure presque avec tendresse le crâne qu'elle tient entre ses mains.{/n}

And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}

languages.text: "Ömrüm boyunca adıma çizilen yolda yürüdüm. Bana denileni yaptım. Bir başkasının sözlerinde hakikati aradım, sonra da kendi sesimle tekrar ettim. Bir kez olsun kaderimi sorgulamadım... Sen çıkıp gelene kadar Nemo." {n}Kibellah'nın metal pençelerini elindeki kafatasının üzerinde sürükleme şekli, neredeyse şefkatli duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "All my life, I have walked the road that was prescribed for me. I did as I was told. I searched for the truth in other people's words, then repeated them in my own voice. And I never once questioned my destiny... until you came along, Nemo." {n}The way Kibellah drags her metal claws across the skull in her hands seems almost affectionate.{/n}
